lines: 338TAAKWE KUFWA MAJWI MABOTUKINDS WORDS NEVER DIE
Taakwe kufwa majwi mabotu, Alazwa mumoyo ulomenye,
Oyeya luyando lwakwe Leza, Inzya mu masi onse nkwabele;
Majwi aluyando tafwi pe, tafwi pe, Majwi aluyando tafwi pe.
Kuyeya kubotu takufwi pe, Mbubona maluba mabotu;
Kula komanisya bantu bonse nene, Obali pengede konse konse,
Kuyeya kubotu takufwi, takufwi, kuyeya kubotu takufwi pe.
Luyando talufwi na tafwile, Na tuli mucuumbwe cisiya mbi;
Twa bola iswe bula boola buzuba, No tuya kuunka kuli Jesu;
Luyando lubotu talufwi, talufwi, Luyando lubotu talufwi pe.
